sections.title: Argent Dramaturge (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Argent Dramaturge class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Argent Performance (Argent Dramaturge)
sections.description: A bardic performance-like ability that uses Perform (sing) to create magical effects specifically targeting outsiders, particularly those affected by silver. Functions similarly to bardic performance but cannot be disrupted and has audible components only.

sections.title: Song of Silver (Su) (Argent Dramaturge)
sections.description: An argent performance that makes all weapons within 30 feet count as silver for damage reduction and grants fear immunity plus bonuses against charm and compulsion effects to multiple targets. At 5th level, can grant breath of life as an immediate action once per day.

sections.title: Anchoring Aria (Su) (Argent Dramaturge)
sections.description: An argent performance that prevents evil outsiders from using teleportation effects within the area and staggers those that teleport into or are summoned into the area. Requires caster level checks for teleportation attempts to succeed.

sections.title: Righteous Chord (Sp) (Argent Dramaturge)
sections.description: A standard action that costs 2 performance rounds to affect a single evil outsider with banishment, with a Perform check potentially counting as presenting a feared object. Does not end other active performances.

sections.title: Dramaturgical Flourish (Su) (Argent Dramaturge)
sections.description: Special performance modifications gained every 2 levels that enhance existing bardic performances or grant new capabilities. Includes options like Heartening Song, Masterpiece access, Reactive Performance, Sudden Competence, and Ultimate Courage.
